SEARCH
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.galkin.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.galkin.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements Impler, JarImpler
Allows user to produce a class that implements given interfaces. This class implements the Impler and JarImpler interfaces, providing mechanisms to automatically generate implementations of specified interfaces at runtime and compile them into a JAR file.

  • Method Details

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • validateInput

      private void validateInput(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Validates input arguments. Check if a given token and root path are correct.
      Parameters:
      token - the interface class.
      root - the root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if token or root are null, given class is not interface or one is private/final interface

    • writeMethods

      private void writeMethods(Class<?> token, BufferedWriter writer) throws ImplerException, IOException
      Writes implemented methods to the writer. Construct methods implementations and writes it to given writer.
      Parameters:
      token - the interface class.
      writer - the writer to write methods to.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if parameter or return types are private.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing to writer

    • printMethod

      private String printMethod(Method method) throws ImplerException
      Construct the implementation of a single given method. Forms a string representation of given method.
      Parameters:
      method - the method to implement.
      Returns:
      a string containing the implementation of the method.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if a parameter type is private.

    • addFileToJar

      private void addFileToJar(Path source, Path temp, JarOutputStream target) throws IOException
      Adds a file to the given JarOutputStream.
      Parameters:
      source - the file to add to the JAR.
      temp - the temporary directory where program saves temp files.
      target - the JAR output stream to add the file to.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during writing to target

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Usage:
      • Implementor <token> <output>
      • JarImplementor -jar <token> <output>
      Parameters:
      args - array of command line arguments:
      • token -- class token for implementing
      • output -- file for writing new class
